```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(broom)
library(dlnm)
data("chicagoNMMAPS")
chic <- chicagoNMMAPS
chic
mod_1 <- lm(dptp ~ temp, data = chic)
tidy(mod_1)

augment(mod_1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = temp, y = dptp)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_line(aes(y = .fitted), color = "red")

autoplot(mod_1)

mod_2 <- glm(dptp ~ temp, data = chic)
tidy(mod_2)

mod_3 <- lm(pm10 ~ dow, data = chic)
tidy(mod_3)

anova(mod_3)
```
